cast.name: 玛丽娜·亚历山德罗娃 Marina Aleksandrova
伊戈尔·别特连科 Igor Petrenko
弗拉基米尔·谢韦尔科夫 Vladimir Shevelkov
欧嘉·苏图洛娃 Olga Sutulova

director.name: 弗拉基米尔·谢韦尔科夫 Vladimir Shevelkov

introduction: Musical retro romance.Claudia Koval came to Leningrad from Poland with one goal - to get as much knowledge, so it is with the head immersed in their studies. Its motto - "You can not feel sorry for yourself." But fate has prepared her a very different future - it is destined to become a famous singer. About this glory is a dream, because it will know not only in the USSR but also abroad. Naturally, fame has a downside. For all have to pay. And, as a rule, you have to pay for the glory of personal happiness ...A story about love and music in the background of the era. 50s-60s of XX century gave us a galaxy of talented artists who have become legends of Soviet music. The main character of the film - the singer Claudia Koval ( Marina Alexandrova ) - a fictional character and the collective in which fate is guessed life and career of many famous singers of that time such as Maya Kristalinskaya, Aida Vedischeva Tamara Miansarova Nina Brodsky and others.Directed by: Vladimir Shevelkov and Marat Kim Cast: Marina Alexandrova, Igor Petrenko, Olga Sutulova, Nikolai Ivanov, Galina Petrova, Anna Tsukanov-Kott, Sergei Guzeev, Daria Rumyantsev Oleg Diamonds
